item.description:
FREE food, No cover charge, cash bar. 5 PM - 10 PM

RSVP so we can get the correct amount of food.

Boston Event Guide offered us a FREE party (excluding drinks) for 20 people just for responding to their survey about their New Year’s Eve party that several of us attended.

Nestled between Chinatown and South Station in Boston’s Leather District, Splash Ultra Lounge & Burger Bar is Frank DePasquale’s latest venture inspired by the posh nightlife destinations of Miami, Vegas and L.A. Located at 150 Kneeland Street, the water-themed venue boasts a picturesque roof deck in addition to a swanky ultra lounge offering state of the art billiards and after-hours dining till 2 a.m. As Boston’s newest swank ultra-lounge, Splash hosts nightly DJs spinning house, international, top 40’s and mash-up, serving as a chill nightlife destination for both locals and tourists who want to see and be seen. Check out their website for more details. Splash Lounge

The event includes a complimentary full food buffet and free admission.

Here is the sample menu (Items may be updated)

o Crab cakes, Buffalo wings
o Marinated steak tips
o Sliders (regular burger sliders)
o Crab meat sliders
o Assorted pastas

Dress Code:
Dressy casual is the minimum; NO sneakers, t-shirts or hats.

Directions:
It’s a 5 or 6 minute walk from either Chinatown or South Station “T” stations.
item.name: Free Party at Splash Lounge
